skills.name: Count forwards in steps of something other than one

explanations.A: I think you have assumed the pattern would repeat. Mo is counting UP by 5, rather than down. What is 15 + 5?
explanations.B: I think you have added 4. Mo is counting in 5s. What is 15 + 5?
explanations.C: I think you have added 1. Mo is counting in 5s. What is 15 + 5?
explanations.D: If Mo is counting in 5s, we need to add 5 on. 15 + 5 = 20, so the star would be 20.

explanations.A: I think you have added 1. Mo is counting in 5s. What is 27 + 5?
explanations.B: I think you have added 4. Mo is counting in 5s. What is 27 + 5?
explanations.C: If Mo is counting in 5s, we need to add 5 on. 27 + 5 = 32, so the star would be 32.
explanations.D: I think you have assumed the pattern would repeat. Mo is counting UP by 5, rather than down. What is 27 + 5?

explanations.A: If we are skip counting in 5s, the next number will be 105 + 5 = 110, so we will not say 106.
explanations.B: If we keep skip counting in 5s for long enough, we reach 200! Which number can we not get to by counting in 5s from 105?
explanations.C: If we are skip counting in 5s, the next number will be 105 + 5 = 110. Which number here can we not get to by adding 5s on to 105?
explanations.D: If we keep skip counting in 5s for long enough, we reach 150! Which number can we not get to by counting in 5s from 105?

explanations.A: If we are skip counting in 5s, the next number will be 85 + 5 = 90. Which number here can we not get to by adding 5s on to 85?
explanations.B: If we are skip counting in 5s, the next number will be 85 + 5 = 90, so we will not say 87.
explanations.C: If we keep skip counting in 5s for long enough, we reach 180! Which number can we not get to by counting in 5s from 85?
explanations.D: If we keep skip counting in 5s for long enough, we reach 200! Which number can we not get to by counting in 5s from 85?

explanations.A: If we are skip counting in 5s, we add on 5, not 1. Which number is 5 bigger than 132?
explanations.B: If we are skip counting in 5s, we add on 5, but you have added 10...
explanations.C: Counting on 5 from 132 gives 133, 134, 135, 136, 137, so 137 is the next number if we are skip counting in 5s.
explanations.D: Almost! But I think you started counting on 132. We want to count up 133, 134...

explanations.A: Counting on 5 from 113 gives 114, 115, 116, 117, 118, so 118 is the next number if we are skip counting in 5s.
explanations.B: If we are skip counting in 5s, we add on 5, but you have added 10...
explanations.C: Almost! But I think you started counting on 113. We want to count up 114, 115...
explanations.D: If we are skip counting in 5s, we add on 5, not 1. Which number is 5 bigger than 113?

explanations.A: Look at the pattern carefully - we want to count back 5, not just 1!
explanations.B: 471 is the next number after 466. We want the number at the beginning of the sequence, before 456!
explanations.C: Counting back 5 from 456 we get 455, 454, 453, 452, 451, so 451 is the previous number in the pattern.
explanations.D: Not quite - we want to count back 5, not 10!

explanations.A: Not quite - we want to count back 5, not 10!
explanations.B: 393 is the next number after 388. We want the number at the beginning of the sequence, before 378!
explanations.C: Look at the pattern carefully - we want to count back 5, not just 1!
explanations.D: Counting back 5 from 378 we get 377, 376, 375, 374, 373, so 373 is the previous number in the pattern.

explanations.A: Not quite - we want to count back 5, not just 1!
explanations.B: This is the number AFTER 203, but we want the number before. We need to count backwards instead of forwards.
explanations.C: Almost! But I think you started counting on 203. We want to count back 202, 201...
explanations.D: Counting back 5 from 203 we get 202, 201, 200, 199, 198, so 198 is the previous number in the pattern.

explanations.A: This is the number AFTER 182, but we want the number before. We need to count backwards instead of forwards.
explanations.B: Counting back 5 from 182 we get 181, 180, 179, 178, 177, so 177 is the previous number in the pattern.
explanations.C: Almost! But I think you started counting on 182. We want to count back 181, 180...
explanations.D: Not quite - we want to count back 5, not just 1!
